page.title: 05Churches
page.content: In our area there are lots of churches. These include Baptist, Methodist,Church of England,Greek Orthodox,Evangelical, and Roman Catholic.Milton Methodist was rebuilt in 1952 because it was bombed in the Second World War.About 230 people go to special services and 130 go to a morning Sunday service and 50 go to the evening service.If you go to a Methodist church it means you are a follower of John Wesley.At the Baptist you have to be baptised.At a Church of England like St.Martins they have Bishops.Nearly all the churches in our block have Sunday schools.Some churches which include St. Martins and Kewstoke have bells but some do not.Vicars in their spare time visit people in hospitals and try to help them.
